H0.text: A scale and weights are the tool the student should use to best separate gravel and sand from a mixture.

H1.text: A magnet is the tool a student should use to best separate a mixture of gravel and sand.

H2.text: A sieve is the tool a student should use to best separate a mixture of gravel and sand, as instructed.

H3.text: A battery and wire is the tool the student should use to best separate a mixture of gravel and sand.

A7.text: A sieve is a tool used for separating wanted elements from unwanted material or for controlling the particle size distribution of a sample.

A8.text: Sieves are also used to separate stones from sand.
